Description:
AFFORDABLE HOME IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCALE
Nestled away in the heart of Kennington, this solid home offers plenty for the family, first home buyer or investor alike.There's room aplenty comprising 4 bedrooms plus a study, a spacious living area, open kitchen/meals plus a recently modernised bathroom. The home also offers evaporative cooling and a gas heater ensuring year round comfort.Outside there is a secure rear yard for the kids to play plus a single garage/workshop with concrete flooring tucked away out the back.Providing a rare opportunity to move into Kennington on a family friendly budget, with the CBD, schools, Strath Hill, Kennington Village, the reservoir and public transport at your doorstep - An inspection is a must!
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
Perfectly Appointed Home - McIvor Hill Precinct
At this address, you have the best of both worlds. An impressive home in one of Bendigo's most sought after areas. Four bedrooms (main with an ensuite), separate lounge, kitchen/dining family room, a double carport with access to a kids retreat/games room.
The home features:
2 large living areas
Spacious main bedroom with WIR and ensuite
Bedroom 2, 3 & 4 with BIRs
Modern kitchen with quality appliances, dishwasher and breakfast bar
Great size meals/dining area
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
Loads of display shelving
Outside features:
Beautifully established, private gardens
Fabulous decked area for entertaining
2 garden sheds
Front verandah
Office/rumpus/kids room with 2 way access
Lifestyle:
Beautiful home with private aspect
A short walk to shops, schools, doctors & sporting facilities
Located in prestige, quiet court
McIvor Hill precinct
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results 54421422

Description:
Perfectly Presented Family Home In Sought After Location
At this fabulous address you have it all. Located close to well accredited secondary & primary schools, not to mention two local shopping precincts. Featuring four bedrooms, main with ensuite & WIR; the other 3 large bedrooms all have BIRs. The spacious kitchen & meals area feature ample cupboard space, a walk in pantry & breakfast bar. The separate lounge & dining area leads out to a fantastic undercover entertaining area, complete with an inground pool, neat gardens, a water tank, secure fencing, side access and a shed. All this on an extensive sized block of approx. 1300m2, in one of Bendigo's most sought after areas.

Description:
STYLISH, MODERN DAY LIVING
Ideally located in a quiet court setting and only a short drive to the heart of the CBD is this opportunity to snap up a beautiful brand-new townhouses offering stylish, modern day living. Comprising 2 bedrooms, this master built home offers warm, subtle décor throughout with a modern, functional kitchen show-casing quality fittings / appliances and spacious open plan lounge and dining area. Set on a low maintenance block, with landscaping included this home offers comfortable, quality living ideal for someone looking to downsize, an investor or first home buyers alike. With construction now complete be sure to move quick as this opportunity won't last long.

Description:
SEE, LOVE, BUY!
Instantly inviting immaculate two bedroom unit is located in a gorgeous quiet pocket in Kennington. Built in 1973 this brick veneer property is one of 3 individual units - all owner occupied. So bright with natural light this truly loved unit has been recently modernised to perfection.
Interior comprises living/meals area, a new kitchen with gas hot plates,
electric under bench wall oven and pantry. Robed bedrooms. A beautiful bathroom with both a bath and shower. Extras include: gas space heater , new air-conditioning unit and awnings. Rear garden provides privacy along with lovely slate pathways. Single tilt door garage.
Boasts fantastic appeal and provides a very comfortable, easy lifestyle in a wonderful location.

Description:
LIVE THE HIGH LIFE!!
This very comfortable townhouse sits high on a low maintenance 355m2 block, in a lovely quiet street in this tightly held area. Close to the CBD, shopping centers, schools, parks and La Trobe university.The top level consists of the 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and a large main bedroom with walk in robe and en-suite. Not to forget the views from the balcony! The middle level is a spacious open living, dining and kitchen area with access to the backyard. The ample kitchen has gas appliances dishwasher and pantry. As well as the separate laundry.On the lower level you will find the study area and formal lounge with the remote controlled double garage with internal access and a large storage room/workshop attached.The home, of about 27sqs of living area, has ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning, as well as a split system in the open living area, for year around comfort.

IF LOCATION IS IMPORTANT TO YOUâ?¦.
Then you can't go past this solid brick veneer unit, perfectly situated for convenient living.
Just a stone's throw to Lowndes Street shops and a short walk to local schools, Strath Village as well as Central Bendigo make this property ideal for either the Investor or Owner Occupier. Features include spacious open plan living, gas heating, a/c, gas hotplates and electric wall oven, two generous sized bedrooms both with built in robes, separate bath/shower and a single carport. There's the added bonus of a rear yard overlooking Kennington Oval and peace of mind knowing it is all set within a well maintained complex. Previously leased at $240pw, this "value for money" unit is now available for you to own at a realistic price for its favourable position.

Description:
CHARMING COTTAGE - CENTRAL LOCATION
Steeped in period charm is this quaint weatherboard, 2 bedroom plus study (possible small 3rd
bedroom) cottage. Immediately liveable and ever so cosy, the attractive cottage offers
you scope to further extend and enhance it's space and beauty deeper into the block.
Winding brick pathways lead to the bull nosed front verandah rich with feature lacework.
Enter the home via the central hallway, the front two bedrooms have timber built in curtained robes.
One of the bedrooms has a mantle and open fire place. Separate lounge with ceiling fan. Lovely spacious white kitchen/meals with timber bench tops, gas stove, range hood, feature combustion stove and reverse cycle split system. The study/3rd bedroom abuts a long sunroom across the rear of the home where it meets a European style laundry and a neat tiled bathroom with shower over bath with a lovely leadlight window. Recently painted, both inside and out. Feature timber floors and high ceilings.
The front garden is full of roses and spring bulbs whilst the back garden offers retaining brick walls to simply add your own personal touch if you wish. Garden shed. Secure fencing surrounds the property.
A location you can't beat - so close to Bendigo's CBD and all amenities.
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
Supreme site to build your dream
Residential building allotments rarely come more unique, superior or convenient than this extraordinary package. Complete with an undercover alfresco area alongside a self-cleaning, solar-heated swimming pool, this elite 569m2 block is even landscaped! Beautifully paved, the deluxe salt-chlorinated pool is encompassed by safety fencing. It comes equipped with a cover and measures 10.3x3.85 metres, with depth graduating from 1.37 metres to 1.74 metres. Now just imagine how decadent your poolside house-warming party would be! All you need to do is construct your choice of residence. Particularly ideal for a double storey dwelling, the elevated position could capture panoramic views over Bendigo to enhance the value and enjoyment of this exclusive site. All services are readily available, including stormwater and sewer connections at the rear, ready and waiting for your new townhouse. Situated within easy walking distance of 2 primary schools, secondary college and university, a wealth of shopping options, doctors, gym and cafes are in close proximity too. Delightful Kennington Reservoir is also only a wander away, promoting a lifestyle of healthy activities such as jogging, bushwalks, fishing and picnics by the water. Nestled within a quiet court and surrounded by well-established quality homes, this is your chance to secure a pinnacle dream home address.
Please note: The home adjoining this allotment at 91 Lowndes Street is also available for sale.
Enquire with Paul.
Paul Byrne : 0439 441 198

Description:
AS PERFECT AS THEY COME
Built and designed by Russell Parsons for the discerning buyer, offering an enviable lifestyle with the finest of finishes. Seize the opportunity to purchase a modern home in a quiet and sought after location, with an attractive yard, minus the high maintenance.
As neat as a pin, this home offers the highest quality of fixtures and fittings possible. Comprising
3 bedrooms, all with BIRs, main with WIR and ensuite. Study situated at the front of the house is perfect for a home office or the studying student.
Impressive kitchen is well designed with storage & all the modern conveniences. Granite bench tops and glass splash back are other great features. Open plan meals & living area leads you towards the two alfresco areas where you can entertain - rain, hail or shine.
Notable features also include, zoned reverse cycle air conditioning, ducted vacuum and monitored security system, gas log fire and Duo Flex Blinds assuring comfort all year round. The yard is private, secure & landscaped with full watering system and 2 tanks with pressure pump.
Walking distance to Kennington Reservoir, supermarket and cafes this property is in a great location, offering a package with absolutely nothing to do! A must to inspect.
Directions: Left into Kiandra Way of Marnie Road and then first right into Tatiana Close.
Matt Pinniger : 0438395713

Description:
KENNINGTON UNIT
Yes just a short walk to the new shopping centre at Kennington. This fine 2 bedroom unit has all you could wish for. Separate entrance, great lounge with gas heating. Kitchen features gas stove, double
pantry and good dining space.
The two major bedrooms both have BIRs and the main bedroom has a handy split system cooler and CF. Family bathroom with separate shower and bath.
Good laundry leads to a very generous rear garden. Single lock up garage.
This is a rear unit so offers privacy and generous surrounding space, no road noise. A lovely complex of quality and taste, and all within walking distance to shopping and Kennington reservoir for those early morning walks
Walking distance to Latrobe University is another bonus.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
ATTENTION INVESTORS - 6% RETURN!
For Investors looking for a healthy return on their investment - look no further that this property. Currently rented at $250 per week with a lease in place until December 2016. This property is situated in a quiet court only minutes from the new Kennington Village, Strath Hill, Strath Village shops and LaTrobe University. Unit number two is at the rear, one of only two on the block, and is a lovely light-filled abode. The front door opens to a good-size lounge room with an as-new gas wall heater and a reverse-cycle split-system. Ceiling fans are in some rooms. The kitchen has a gas upright stove and rangehood with storage above and below the benchtops. A combined bathroom and laundry adjoins the kitchen with a separate shower and vanity, separate toilet and two-door linen storage. Both bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and ceiling fans. There's a private backyard with a garden shed and gated access to the walking track. A single carport is at the front. As well as the great shopping options, you'll love the convenience of other facilities and amenities, including Kennington Reservoir, Latrobe University, schools and the closeness of the CBD.
Bronwyn Hosking : 0408 509 733

Description:
Don't Let This One Get Away!
In the perfect location, close to schools, shops & public transport is this low maintenance, solidly built one bedroom unit. Features include a built in robe, a spacious lounge with gas heating and a functional kitchen. Step outside to a private court yard & off street parking. Properties like this are snapped up quickly; this is an ideal property for a single person wanting a low maintenance property or for an investors rental portfolio, as one bedroom units are always in very high demand. We have prospective tenants enquiring about one bedroom units on a regular basis. Act now! Call for an inspection.

Description:
POSITION, POSITION, POSITION
Whimsical and character filled weatherboard cottage in a premier location only a short walk to the CBD and surrounding amenities. Currently rented, this is an ideal opportunity for savvy investors but equally attractive to a range of purchasers including first home buyers. Featuring rustic kitchen with rippled iron feature cabinetry, dishwasher and pantry, dining, lounge with French doors, 3 bedrooms with built-in robes, central bathroom and external laundry. Creature comforts and features include polished timber floorboards, ceiling fans dotted throughout plus evaporative cooling and central heating. Resting on 440m2 (approx.) block, there's space to enjoy complete with covered and paved patio, dual driveways - one each side of the home, single carport, tool shed and workshop with power. And if you're ready to get your hands dirty, the backyard is a blank canvas just bursting with gardening potential. Nest or investâ?¦the choice is yours!

Description:
QUALITY, INNER CITY LIVING AT ITS BEST
From the first step that you take into this near new town house you will be amazed by the quality and perfect finish that it offers. The home is beautifully presented and comprises an expansive kitchen overlooking the family and meals area showcasing quality appliances, an enormous walk-in pantry, soft close draws and polished timber floors ensuring that it is the envy of your friends and guests. Choose your master bedroom, all 3 are generously sized and have their very own ensuite and split system reverse cycle heating and cooling with 1 on the ground floor and 2 upstairs. Up top there is also a sitting/games room area. Outside there is a private alfresco area with a retractable café style awning that is the perfect place to entertain all year round with low maintenance gardens that create a beautiful back drop, whether looking from inside or out. The property also offers a double garage with remote powered roller door; a third car will also fit between the garage and the electric security fence. Set on its own title and located within a short stroll to the CBD and all that it has to offer, this home is perfect for inner city living! An inspection will more than impress.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
3 Bedroom Home with a Stunning Makeover
The stunning makeover at this address will have you amazed!!
A rare find in the property market today, this renovated, triple fronted 3 bedroom home is all class.
From the moment you walk through the door, you will be wowed by the presentation of this delightful property.
Beautiful polished floorboards greet you from the front entrance, and continue on through the lounge room and kitchen/meals area.
There are built-in robes and updated carpets in all of the bedrooms, with bedroom 3 also having built-in drawers and mirrored dressing table.
The spacious bathroom incorporates a bath, basin, vanity and toilet, plus there is a 2nd toilet conveniently located off the decked outdoor area.
Keeping the climate controlled all year round is the ducted heating and cooling units.
The quality kitchen has a dishwasher, electric hot plates, electric oven, with ample bench space and cupboards.
From here, you can access the massive timber deck area through double glass doors, perfect for all-weather entertaining.
There is also a paved sitting area amongst the fully landscaped yard, which includes a variety of different plants and trees, making this colourful backyard very inviting.
Only a short stroll to all the popular schools, shops and Bendigo CBD.
Jump the queue to get into one of the hottest pockets in Bendigo and inspect this property now!
Matt Gretgrix : 0438 911 688

Description:
WARM AND STYLISH...WELCOME HOME!
If you've ever wanted a family home that oozes 'wow-factor'â?¦ this is it! Superbly positioned and presented, this spacious 4 bedroom home with quality finishes throughout is sure to impress. Meticulously maintained and saturated by natural light, this home offers a practical floorplan with two large separate living zones including formal lounge, spacious open plan kitchen, living/family and dining. The kitchen features ample cabinets, Caesarstone benches and splashback, stainless steel appliances, double pyrolytic self-cleaning oven, induction cooktop, double drawer dishwasher, double pantry, space for fridge and freezer plus brekky bar - making this sleek kitchen an absolute dream. The master suite features a sunny bay window, walk-in robe and modern ensuite with stone vanity top. The 3 remaining queen-size bedrooms, all contain double robes, with one even having its own ensuite! A central family bathroom, separate toilet and a generous laundry complete the amenities.
With garden views from every window the orientation of the home captures the winter sun. Comfort is provided all year round with 2 split system air-conditioners and gas ducted heating throughout.
Outside is an entertainers delight with an alfresco entertaining area surrounded by lush low-maintenance gardens - all maintained by an automated watering system.
Outside is completed by a shady rear veranda, rainwater tanks, single lock-up garage with concrete floor and power, and a double carport.
A short walk to Kennington Village, Strath Village and Strath Hill shopping centres, cafes, La Trobe University, Kennington Reservoir and bush walking tracks. It is also walking distance to the neighbourhood schools of Bendigo South East College, Kennington Primary School and Victory Christian College. This cherished home is a true reward for the fortunate purchaser.

Description:
STUNNING TRANSFORMATION
A complete and thorough modern contemporary update to this beautifully established 4 bedroom family home includes 2 sparkling new bathrooms, new kitchen with 900mm appliances, new carpets and tiles throughout and new blinds.
- 4 bedrooms, ensuite and WIR to the main
- Open plan family meals and living zone
- 2nd living area/billiard room
- Ducted heating and cooing
Outside the generous 917 sqm (approx.) allotment includes a solar heated in ground pool, lush green lawn, enclosed paved patio, double lock up garage and side access. All the benefits of a brand new home within close proximity to Strathdale shopping, South East College and LaTrobe University. The perfect family proposition.

Description:
Timeless Quality
Set on an elevated allotment in one of the most peaceful streets in the heart of Kennington, this two-bedroom plus study townhouse is spacious enough to be a family home. Whilst boasting all the benefits of downsizingâ?? easy care gardens, secure backyard, and minimal upkeep, it doesn't compromise on entertaining. Featuring Lounge room, large high functional kitchen, separate dining and a separate study. The highlight of this property is the large sunroom which leads on the back entertaining area. Perfect for seamless inside, outside living.
With one of the best floorplans you are likely to see, this is a timeless build, with classic features which never go out of style.â?¨There are high ceilings, bay windows, a modern bathroom for each bedroom, evaporative cooling throughout the home and great insulation to keep you comfortable year round.â?¨ With reverse cycle air-conditioning and numerous TV points. â?¨This house offers great living flexibility and with all the services close by in walking distance at Strath Village and Strath Hill, this is an address to inspect with confidence.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results! (03) 5442 1422.
